Pit.Name: empty pit
Pit.description: You find yourself at the bottom of a pit. The air is cool and humid. You can see no way to climb out.

AbovePit.Name: above the pit
AbovePit.description: You are in the open desert. The sun beats down on your skin. The air is dry

Tunnel.Name: dark tunnel
Tunnel.description: You are in the open desert. The sun beats down on your skin. The air is dry
